item.title: EDC Gadgets in My Pockets
item.description:
EDC essentials prepare you for the worst and empower you to do your best.

What is EDC?

EDC stands for every day carry. An everyday carry is the collection of items you carry with you in your pockets or in your bag on a daily basis. For example, an everyday carry could be a collection of flashlights, multitoos, wallets, smartphones, pens, etc… They are small gadgets fitting into the pockets or bags, and they are always prepared for some special cases to make daily life easier.

It’s a life style

EDC in my pockets

Daily Essentials

Wallet

Spacewallet 2.0 Push space saving coins

Wallet Ninja smartphone supporter: 2 credit cards better 2 useless cards because of cutting by wallet ninja letter opener screw driver

Keychain

qeypr

Shopping Cart Key

It’s annoying to go shopping without coins to open shopping cart.

Make Life Better

Multitool: Leatherman BREWZER Bottle opener mini pry Can opener pocket friendly

Gerber Shard

Flashlight: Nitecore Tube

Double press button 45 Lumens Light weight USB charge

Swiss Knife: Small Pocket Knife Small blade Scissor

Fidget spinner

Secret Service

metal Brass material, it’s heavy and it feels good R188 bearing, speed promising small easy to carry

Metal 6 Wings Spinner Removable wings light

Digital Life

Smartphone: Oneplus 3T

Watch: Sony SmartWatch 3

Back to the year 2014, Sony SW3 is the one of the first generation of smartwatches. It carries GPS and NFC.

Headphone Pack

TaoTronics Bluetooth Headphones wireless but not fancy magnet: hanging on the neck budget

USB OTG Flash Drive small data transfer, doc to print encrypted data info
